vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting an amendment to and an expansion of Planned Development District No. 400; and an ordinance granting a Specific Use Permit for an open space use on property zoned Planned Development District No. 400 and an R-16(A) Single Family District, on the southwest and northwest corners of Merrell Road and Midway Road
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval, subject to a revised development plan, a south and southwest landscape buffer exhibit, a revised traffic management plan, and staff’s recommended conditions; and denial of a proposed Specific Use Permit for an open space use
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval, subject to a revised development plan, a south and southwest landscape buffer exhibit, a revised traffic management plan, and conditions; and approval of a Specific Use Permit for special events for Eagle Way Outdoor Learning Space for a five-year period, subject to a site plan and conditions
Z190-341(RM)
Note: This item was deferred by the City Council before opening the public hearing on January 12, 2022, and is scheduled for consideration on February 23, 2022.
